message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, considering the value of the product to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we try again? I'm willing to go up to $8,800. Can you meet me there?
